"Are we really friends?" implies that we're dealing with false friends.
Mitä is not an English word. What language is it in?
Where is TalTech? What language do they speak there?
With the exception of the last five lines, the dialogue can be split into sections of three lines each which match the style of the title text. Each section focuses on a certain false friend.
Use the numbers to index into the false friends in the order that they are given.
